name: The Astronauts Dark Mode
description: Enables Dark Mode for The Astronauts website. Contrast/Readability taken into consideration.
additional_info:
v1.10 - Decreased the Brightness of the Vivid Red Box in order to increase visibility as seen on the "Winter (Update) is Coming..." Post.
v1.01 - Improved the visibility of the Quote Box, increased the Contrast of the Bright Amber Box.
v1.00 - Initial Release
